strings.string: Plate layouts (Easy, Moderate, Hard) are created by the United States Olympic + Paralympic Committee's sport nutrition team. Your plate is decided using
calories burned and your calculated BMR. This app is not intended to serve as a substitute for the consultation, diagnosis, or medical treatment of a qualified dietition.
